item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: Welcome in demo of the Terminal theme. Please, look around and check whether this is something for you. And if you like it, give it a chance. Anddddd just one more small thing. You can also set **coverImage** for your posts...

item.title: Lorem Ipsum

item.title: Showcase
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Astro content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in the Astro Terminal theme.

item.title: Code blocks examples
item.description: The Astro Terminal theme uses Shiki as syntax highlighter, providing beautiful and customizable code highlighting.
